channel.title: Feedback Thread for Song Structure
channel.description:
I’ve had an idea that is better than what I’ve ever made in Auxy, but I’m not sure how to form the song structure. Here’s the download link:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/tqr9ltuFTsYy21HtXGiUvw==
Feel free to critique, advise, remix and post your own loops that need structural editing for me to listen to. Cheers!

item.title: Feedback Thread for Song Structure

item.description:
Damn dude, thanks! I’ll give it a shot and repost the finished/non-finished product later on this week

Structure isn’t really my strong point, needs work on the flow of things and not sound so abrupt.

Read full topic

item.title: Feedback Thread for Song Structure
item.dc:creator: moemx
item.description:
Nice melody! Love it.

I’d keep it relatively clean structure wise.

  • 8 bar buildup
  • 16 bar intro
  • drop / pre chorus
  • chorus #1 for 16 bars
  • some sort of bridge where you introduce a new melody / some instruments
  • repeat part from intro - except have chorus 2 EXTRA fueled with Instruments (that you introduced before), to make it killer melodic and add more variation at bar changes (tiny fills etc))… chorus #2 for at least 24 bars - cause you wanna hear the good part juuuust a little longer
  • outro / fade out about 8-16 bars

I’d try around with this and see where this ends up
With.

Does That help?

Read full topic
